name: Siddhant Nasare
title: AI & Data Engineer
homepage_quote: I don’t just build AI system  I build the future they’ll live in.
homepage_about: I'm Siddhant Nasare, an AI & Data Engineer based in the Buffalo, U.S.A, specializing in building intelligent systems that bridge business and technology. My work spans data engineering, machine learning, and Generative AI — from designing demand-forecasting models that reduced stock-outs by 18% to developing research assistants that cut analysis time by 85%. I focus on creating solutions that are scalable, resilient, and business-ready, turning complex data into real-world impact.
about_me:
Hi, I’m Siddhant — an AI & Data Engineer passionate about building intelligent systems that solve real-world problems. I pursued my Master’s in Business Analytics at Arizona State University (GPA 3.9), I specialize in combining machine learning, data engineering, and Generative AI to drive measurable business impact.
Over the past few years, I’ve designed and deployed solutions across industries:

At Accenture, I engineered large-scale ETL pipelines and optimized SQL workflows for the Bank of Ireland, improving data accuracy by 35% and reducing processing time by 25%.

At Teradyne, I built ML-based demand forecasting models and safety-stock optimization pipelines, cutting stock-outs by 18% and enabling scalable analytics on AWS Redshift + S3.

At DigiTech Services, I developed a GenAI-powered RAG platform that reduced research time by 85% and built low-latency APIs for production-ready LLM queries and currently I'm trying to build an LLM for a business model transformation project.

Beyond work, I enjoy experimenting with AI side projects — from an ID Verification System using computer vision to a Career Conversation Chatbot that makes resumes more interactive.

I believe technology should not only be innovative but also practical, scalable, and human-centered. My mission is to keep pushing the boundaries of AI to make data-driven decisions faster, smarter, and more impactful.

education.degree: Master's of Science in Business Analytics
